scripts.pre-build: yarn run cleanup && prebuild -r electron -t 3.0.0 -t 4.0.0 -t 4.0.4 -t 5.0.0 --strip && prebuild -t 8.16.0 -t 10.12.0 --strip && prebuild --upload-all
scripts.compile: npm install && node-gyp configure && node_modules/.bin/tree-sitter generate && node-gyp build
scripts.test_complete: rm -rf build && rm -rf binding.gyp && rm -rf index.js && rm -rf src && node_modules/.bin/tree-sitter generate && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && node_modules/.bin/tree-sitter test
